definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: This grave matron had several sorts of practice.
sentences.chinese: 这位假正经的妇人有好几种惯做的事情。

sentences.english: It's that sanctimonious air that people can't stand.
sentences.chinese: 人们所不能容忍的就是那副假正经的样子。

sentences.english: He spoke to her in a mock serious manner.
sentences.chinese: 他以一种假正经的态度跟她说话。

definition: flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
noble and virtuous/aloof from politics and material pursuits
outside appearance and inner reality differ (idiom); not what it seems/saying one thing but meaning sth different
(coll.) to wag one's tongue/to indulge in idle gossip and silly jokes/to chatter endlessly/to speak glibly
(coll.) outwardly cold or retiring but deep and passionate inside
